data.expected_result: It should prompt you to enter your auth code saying "I acknowledge by transferring of this server to [name], it officially belongs to them"
data.short_description: Incomplete message pops up while transferring ownership with 2FA enabled (works only with Android 7 and above with 2FA)
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable 2FA if it's not already enabled  - Try transferring ownership
